title: VeriVoice: Enhanced Audio Deepfake Detection with Depthwise Frequency Convolutions
description: Implementations of a Graph-Enhanced Audio Transformer for detecting deepfake audio. This project includes a novel approach using depthwise frequency convolutions to enhance the model's performance.

title: Gesture2Text: An image processing approach using LSTM and CNN
description: My teammates and I developed LSTM and CNN models to translate American Sign Language gestures into text. We analyzed and compared their performance, highlighting the effectiveness of LSTMs on smaller datasets and CNNs on larger ones.

title: vintellx-website
